channel.title: [PI] Help with jaring client
channel.description:
Well, i'm looking for someone who can help me jaring the client and webclient on teamtviwer
Problems faced when i jar the client: 1- The client will be like 15-16m after jaring. 2- I can't open the client after jaring
When i jar my client i think that im missing something So if anyone wanna help me on this two steps would really be appreciated
Add me in skype if you want to help me: naseem1311
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Help with jaring client
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

Write up some batch code to run the jar, something like this:

@echo off java -jar ".\client.jar" pause

That will output any errors.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help with jaring client
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

iBunnie:

Make sure you did the cache right? Are you jarring an auto downloading cache client or just a client with cache in it?

Honestly i don’t know, It’s called: CacheDownloader.java and cacheDownloader.class

Can you help me with teamviewer if you can?

[hr]

www.sagi-x.com:

When jarring you should only include the bytecode (.class files). In java the source code is compiled into bytecode which can then be run as a program.

I did this step by jaring only the class files, But there still only one problem that i can’t open that java file [The client i got after jaring]

Can you help me with teamviewer if you can?

Read full topic
